name: Mafia
description: The Mafia is a secret criminal organization that is present in the town. They are the main antagonists of the game and are responsible for the majority of the killings that take place. The Mafia members know who each other are and work together to eliminate the other players in the town.
win: The Mafia wins when they outnumber the other players in the town.
lose: The Mafia loses when they are outnumbered by the other players in the town.

name: Town
description: The Town is made up of the majority of the players in the game. They are the main protagonists and are responsible for trying to eliminate the Mafia members from the town. The Town members do not know who each other are and must work together to figure out who the Mafia members are.
win: The Town wins when they eliminate all of the Mafia members from the town.
lose: The Town loses when they are outnumbered by the Mafia members in the town.

name: Neutral
description: The Neutral player is a player who has their own win condition that is separate from the Town and Mafia. The Neutral player can win the game on their own terms and can choose to side with either the Town or the Mafia depending on their win condition.
win: The Neutral player wins when they achieve their own win condition.
lose: The Neutral player loses when they fail to achieve their win condition.

name: Doctor
description: The Doctor is a Town member who has the ability to protect other players from being killed by the Mafia. Each night, the Doctor can choose to protect one player from being killed by the Mafia. If the Mafia targets the player that the Doctor has protected, the player will survive the attack.
win: The Doctor wins when they help the Town eliminate all of the Mafia members from the town.
lose: The Doctor loses when they are eliminated from the game.

name: Sheriff
description: The Sheriff is a Town member who has the ability to investigate other players to determine if they are a member of the Mafia. Each night, the Sheriff can choose to investigate one player to see if they are a member of the Mafia. The Sheriff will receive a result of either 'Mafia' or 'Not Mafia' for the player that they investigate.
win: The Sheriff wins when they help the Town eliminate all of the Mafia members from the town.
lose: The Sheriff loses when they are eliminated from the game.

name: Vigilante
description: The Vigilante is a Town member who has the ability to kill other players at night. Each night, the Vigilante can choose to kill one player that they suspect of being a member of the Mafia. If the player that the Vigilante kills is a member of the Mafia, the player will be eliminated from the game.
win: The Vigilante wins when they help the Town eliminate all of the Mafia members from the town.
lose: The Vigilante loses when they are eliminated from the game.
